definition: (Tw) (American) Indian/native American/indigenous peoples of the Americas/also written 印第安[Yin4 di4 an1]
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: The name Sabancaya means “tongue of fire” in the Quechua Indian language.
sentences.chinese: 在克丘亚印地安语中，萨班卡亚是“火舌”的意思。

sentences.english: Then the Indians put Owen in a canoe.
sentences.chinese: 然后，印地安人把他奉上一只划子。

sentences.english: Indians called this longest of North American rivers "Father of Waters".
sentences.chinese: 印地安人称这条北美最长的河流为“河流之父”。

sentences.english: Stockard turned, and cut off the Indian's head with his ax.
sentences.chinese: 斯多卡德回过身，用斧头砍下那个印地安人的头。

sentences.english: After unpacking, we meet up for a walk to an abandoned Indian village.
sentences.chinese: 放下行李，我们步行来到一个废弃的印地安村落。

sentences.english: James Goodrich - former governor of Indiana state.
In American Indian traditions, a story has at least two purposes.
sentences.chinese: 美国印地安传统中，故事至少会有两个目的。

sentences.english: The Indians came back with their enemys scalps .
sentences.chinese: 印地安人带着敌人的头皮回来了。

sentences.english: The Indians often attacked the settlements of the colonist.
sentences.chinese: 印地安人经常袭击殖民者的定居点。

sentences.english: Some Indians still live in wigwams.
sentences.chinese: 有些印地安人仍然住在帐篷里。

sentences.english: Dar's buckwheat cakes an' Injun batter.
sentences.chinese: 那儿有荞麦饼和印地安饼糊。

sentences.english: Most of Indians of the North American plains are nomadic.
sentences.chinese: 北美平原上的印地安人大多居无定所。

sentences.english: Rhodium plated ring with a large Indian Sapphire prong set crystal.
sentences.chinese: 镀白金色戒指配以一大颗印地安蓝色爪镶水晶。

sentences.english: Indians ask their new chief whether the winter will be cold or mild.
sentences.chinese: 印地安人问他们的新酋长，这个冬天是冷还是温暖。

sentences.english: And an ancient Indian burial ground?

definition: Maori, indigenous Polynesian people of New Zealand
Inuit (politically correct term for Eskimo 愛斯基摩人|爱斯基摩人)
Ainu (ethnic group of Japan's north and Russia's east)
Paiwan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
the Sami people, indigenous people in northern Scandinavia
Amis or Pangcah, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
Bunun, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
